director.name: 杰西卡·莎拉·林兰 Jessica Sarah Rinland

introduction: With her 16mm camera, Jessica Sarah Rinland documents the incredible biodiversity of fauna and flora of the second biggest wetland in the world (Iberá, in Argentina). “In Y Berá – Bright Waters (2016), humans have disappeared altogether, merely present in the written and spoken descriptions that catalogue the many shimmering organisms to be found in a vast Argentinian wetland.” (James Lattimer)
